trans-unit.source: A control that displays an image and responds to mouse clicks on the image.
trans-unit.target: 一个控件，用于显示图像并响应对图像进行的鼠标单击。

trans-unit.source: In this topic:
trans-unit.target: 本主题内容：

trans-unit.source: [Introduction](#introduction)
trans-unit.target: [介绍](#introduction)

trans-unit.source: [Determining Where the User Clicked](#DeterminingWhereTheUserClicked)
trans-unit.target: [确定用户单击的位置](#DeterminingWhereTheUserClicked)

trans-unit.source: [ImageButton Controls and Validation](#ButtonControlsAndValidation)
trans-unit.target: [ImageButton 控件和验证](#ButtonControlsAndValidation)

trans-unit.source: [Accessibility](#accessibility)
trans-unit.target: [辅助功能](#accessibility)

trans-unit.source: [Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax)
trans-unit.target: [声明性语法](#DeclarativeSyntax)

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 介绍

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control to display an image that responds to mouse clicks.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件来显示响应鼠标单击的图像。

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Command> events are raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 同时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Command>引发事件时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件被单击。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnCommand%2A> event handler to make the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control behave like a Command button.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnCommand%2A>事件处理程序，以使<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件的行为类似于命令按钮。

trans-unit.source: A command name can be associated with the control by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 命令名称可通过使用与控件关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This allows multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> controls to be placed on the same Web page.
trans-unit.target: 这允许拥有多个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件放置在相同的网页上。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName%2A> property can then be programmatically identified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnCommand%2A> event handler to determine the appropriate action to perform when each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName%2A>在中，属性可以然后以编程方式标识<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnCommand%2A>事件处理程序来确定适当的措施来执行时每个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件被单击。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandArgument%2A> property can also be used to pass additional information about the command, such as specifying ascending order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandArgument%2A>属性还可以用于传递有关命令，例如，指定按升序进行排序的其他信息。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control is similar to using the ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件是类似于使用 ASP.NET<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Button Web Server Controls Content Map](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/66b3ce28-3b93-4f0a-951f-42fb5bb5fddf).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[按钮 Web 服务器控件内容映射](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/66b3ce28-3b93-4f0a-951f-42fb5bb5fddf)。

trans-unit.source: and the class overview for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control.
trans-unit.target: 和类概述<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件。

trans-unit.source: Determining Where the User Clicked
trans-unit.target: 确定用户单击的位置

trans-unit.source: By using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnClick%2A> event handler, you can programmatically determine the coordinates where the image is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnClick%2A>事件处理程序，可以以编程方式确定单击的图像的坐标。

trans-unit.source: You can then code a response, based on the values of the coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以编写代码的响应，根据坐标的值。

trans-unit.source: Note that the origin (0, 0) is located at the upper left corner of the image.
trans-unit.target: 请注意原点 （0，0） 位于图像的左上角。

trans-unit.source: ImageButton Controls and Validation
trans-unit.target: ImageButton 控件和验证

trans-unit.source: By default, page validation is performed when an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，执行页验证时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件被单击。

trans-unit.source: Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control.
trans-unit.target: 页验证确定输入的控件是否与全部通过指定由验证控件的验证规则页上的验证控件。

trans-unit.source: To prevent page validation from occurring, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CausesValidation%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止发生页验证，将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CausesValidation%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Accessibility
trans-unit.target: 可访问性

trans-unit.source: For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何配置此控件，以使其生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在单击 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> 控件时是否执行验证。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if validation is performed when the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> control is clicked; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在单击 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> 控件后执行验证，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: By default, page validation is performed when an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，执行页验证时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件被单击。

trans-unit.source: Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control.
trans-unit.target: 页验证确定输入的控件是否与全部通过指定由验证控件的验证规则页上的验证控件。

trans-unit.source: You can specify or determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control is clicked by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CausesValidation%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定或确定是否在客户端和服务器上执行验证时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>通过单击控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CausesValidation%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To prevent validation from being performed, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CausesValidation%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要禁止从正在执行的验证，请设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CausesValidation%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly set to `false` for a Reset or Clear button to prevent validation from being performed when the button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 此属性通常设置为`false`重置或清除按钮以防止在单击该按钮时执行验证。

trans-unit.source: When the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `true`, you can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.ValidationGroup%2A> property to specify the name of the validation group for which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control causes validation.
trans-unit.target: 时的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CausesValidation%2A>属性设置为`true`，你还可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.ValidationGroup%2A>属性来为其指定验证组的名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件进行验证。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Command> event is raised when an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Command>引发事件时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件被单击。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Command> event is raised through the control hierarchy in the form of the `BubbleEvent`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Command>通过控件层次结构中的窗体中引发事件`BubbleEvent`。

trans-unit.source: This event causes the page to post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 此事件导致页后，可以回发到服务器。

trans-unit.source: An optional argument that supplements the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName" /> property.

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> controls are related and share the same value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName%2A> property, such as `Sort`.
trans-unit.target: 有时，多个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件相关和共享相同的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName%2A>属性，如`Sort`。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to supplement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName%2A> property with additional information about the command to perform, such as `Ascending`.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性来补充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName%2A>命令执行，如关于的其他信息的属性`Ascending`。

trans-unit.source: The values of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandArgument%2A> properties are typically used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnCommand%2A> event handler to determine the action to perform when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandArgument%2A>属性通常用在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnCommand%2A>事件处理程序来确定要执行时的操作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件被单击。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the command name associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> 控件关联的命令名。

trans-unit.source: The command name associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 与 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> 控件关联的命令名。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the command to perform when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control is clicked, such as `Sort`, `Cancel`, or `Edit`.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性来指定时要执行的命令<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>单击控件，如`Sort`， `Cancel`，或`Edit`。

trans-unit.source: This allows multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> controls to be placed on the same Web page.
trans-unit.target: 这允许拥有多个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件放置在相同的网页上。

trans-unit.source: The value in this property can then be programmatically identified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnCommand%2A> event handler to determine the appropriate action to perform when each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 在中，此属性中的值可以然后以编程方式标识<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnCommand%2A>事件处理程序来确定适当的措施来执行时每个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件被单击。

trans-unit.source: Supplemental information about the command, such as specifying ascending sort order, can be included by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过使用包含有关该命令，例如，指定按升序排序，补充信息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> can be clicked to perform a post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以单击 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> 以执行到服务器的回发。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已启用该控件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Enabled%2A> property to specify whether an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> can be clicked to perform a post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Enabled%2A>属性指定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>可通过单击执行回发到服务器。

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to `false`, the control renders on the page, but does not raise a post back event when clicked.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性设置为`false`，该控件会呈现在页上，但不会引发回发事件单击时。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Enabled%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The page contains two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: 页包含两个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Enabled%2A> property is set to `true` for the `EnabledImageButton` image button, causing it to post back to the server when clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Enabled%2A>属性设置为`true`为`EnabledImageButton`图像按钮，从而导致回发到服务器在单击时。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Enabled%2A> property is set to `false` for the `NotEnabledImageButton` image button, causing it to render on the page, but not post back to the server when clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Enabled%2A>属性设置为`false`为`NotEnabledImageButton`图像按钮，从而可以呈现在页上，但不是回发到服务器在单击时。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control generates an alternate-text attribute for an empty string value.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示控件是否为空字符串值生成替换文字特性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" />, indicating that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> control does not generate an alternate-text attribute when the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText" /> property is empty.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="false" /> 时，指示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> 控件在 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText" /> 属性为空时不生成替换文字特性。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control renders the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A> property using an `alt` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件呈现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A>属性使用`alt`属性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A> property is not set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control does not include the `alt` attribute to specify the alternate-text in the control rendering.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A>未设置属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件不包括`alt`特性以指定在控件呈现的替换文字。

trans-unit.source: The XHTML document type definition requires the `alt` attribute on image controls.
trans-unit.target: XHTML 文档类型定义需要`alt`图像控件上的属性。

trans-unit.source: However, accessibility best practices recommend that image controls that do not convey information relevant to the context of the Web page should not specify an `alt` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 但是，辅助功能最佳做法建议不传达网页上的上下文相关的信息的图像控件不应指定`alt`属性。

trans-unit.source: You can meet both XHTML and accessibility requirements by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过设置满足 XHTML 和可访问性要求<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set this property.
trans-unit.target: 已尝试设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions" /> object that represents the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> control's postback behavior.
trans-unit.target: 创建表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions" /> 控件的回发行为的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions" /> that represents the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> control's postback behavior.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions" /> 控件的回发行为的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.GetPostBackOptions%2A> method creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions> object that represents the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control's postback behavior.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.GetPostBackOptions%2A>方法创建<xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions>对象，表示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件的回发行为。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions> object is then typically passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetPostBackEventReference%28System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, which is used to obtain a reference to a client-side script function that, when invoked, causes the server to postback to the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions>对象通常然后传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetPostBackEventReference%28System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，用于获取对客户端脚本函数的引用，调用时，会导致服务器到页回发。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers when extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由控件开发人员扩展时使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>类。

trans-unit.source: You can override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.GetPostBackOptions" /> method in your derived class to modify the postback options for the button control, or to call client-side script when the button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 您可以重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.GetPostBackOptions" />在派生类来修改按钮控件的回发选项，或单击该按钮时调用客户端脚本中的方法。

trans-unit.source: Be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.GetPostBackOptions" /> method so that the standard postback options are set.
trans-unit.target: 一定要调用基类的<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.GetPostBackOptions" />方法，以便这些标准的回发选项进行设置。

trans-unit.source: The key value used to index an entry in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 用于对集合中的项进行索引的键值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> that contains post information.
trans-unit.target: 包含发布信息的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Processes posted data for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 处理 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> 控件的已发布数据。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="false" /> for all cases.
trans-unit.target: 各种情况下均返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.LoadPostData%2A> member is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.LoadPostData%2A>派生从自定义类时，主要由控件开发人员使用的成员<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> checks to see if the x and y values were posted, which indicates that the image was clicked by the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>检查以确定如果 x 和 y 值已发布，指示用户已单击该图像。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> then registers with the page that it wants to raise an event during the event-processing phase.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>然后注册它想要在事件处理阶段过程中引发事件的页面。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ImageClickEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ImageClickEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click" /> event and allows you to handle the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click" /> event directly.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click" /> 事件并允许直接处理 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click> event is raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click>引发事件时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件被单击。

trans-unit.source: By using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnClick%2A> event handler, you can programmatically determine the coordinates where the image is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnClick%2A>事件处理程序，可以以编程方式确定单击的图像的坐标。

trans-unit.source: You can then code a response, based on the values of these coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以编写代码的响应，根据这些坐标的值。

trans-unit.source: Note that the origin (0, 0) is located at the upper left corner of the image.
trans-unit.target: 请注意原点 （0，0） 位于图像的左上角。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 在 Web 窗体应用程序中使用事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnClick%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnClick%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click> event to display the coordinates where the user clicks the image.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何指定和代码的处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click>事件以显示当用户单击该图像的坐标。

trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnClick(System.Web.UI.ImageClickEventArgs)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnClick(System.Web.UI.ImageClickEventArgs)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the client-side script that executes when an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> control's <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click" /> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在引发 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> 控件的 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click" /> 事件时所执行的客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: The client-side script that executes when an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> control's <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click" /> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 在引发 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> 控件的 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click" /> 事件时所执行的客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnClientClick%2A> property to specify additional client-side script that executes when an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnClientClick%2A>属性来指定时，会执行的其他客户端脚本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: The script that you specify for this property is rendered in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control's `OnClick` attribute in addition to the control's predefined client-side script.
trans-unit.target: 为此属性呈现在指定的脚本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件的`OnClick`属性除了控件的预定义的客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Command" /> event and allows you to handle the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Command" /> event directly.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Command" /> 事件并允许直接处理 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Command" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Command> event is raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Command>引发事件时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件被单击。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnCommand%2A> event handler is used to make the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control behave like a Command button.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnCommand%2A>使用事件处理程序以使<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件的行为类似于命令按钮。

trans-unit.source: A command name can be associated with the control by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 命令名称可通过使用与控件关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandName%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This allows multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> controls to be placed on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 这允许拥有多个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件在网页上放置。

trans-unit.source: The value in this property can then be programmatically identified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnCommand%2A> event handler to determine the appropriate action to perform when each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 在中，此属性中的值可以然后以编程方式标识<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnCommand%2A>事件处理程序来确定适当的措施来执行时每个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件被单击。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandArgument%2A> property can also be used to pass additional information about the command, such as specifying ascending order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CommandArgument%2A>属性还可以用于传递有关命令，例如，指定按升序进行排序的其他信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Command> event is raised through the control hierarchy in the form of the `BubbleEvent`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Command>通过控件层次结构中的窗体中引发事件`BubbleEvent`。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 在 Web 窗体应用程序中使用事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnCommand%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnCommand%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Command> event to determine which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何指定和代码的处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Command>事件来确定哪些<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件被单击。

trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnCommand(System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnCommand(System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the image has been clicked prior to rendering on the client.
trans-unit.target: 确定图像在客户端上呈现之前是否已被单击。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.OnPreRender%2A>派生从自定义类时，主要由控件开发人员使用方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the page to post to from the current page when the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置单击 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> 控件时从当前页发送到的网页的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the Web page to post to from the current page when the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 单击 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> 控件时从当前页发送到的网页的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string (""), which causes the page to post back to itself.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示将页回发到自身。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.PostBackUrl%2A> property allows you to perform a cross-page post using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.PostBackUrl%2A>属性允许你执行跨页面 post 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.PostBackUrl%2A> property to the URL of the Web page to post to when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.PostBackUrl%2A>属性时要发送到 Web 页的 url<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件被单击。

trans-unit.source: For example, specifying `Page2.aspx` causes the page that contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control to post to `Page2.aspx`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，指定`Page2.aspx`导致包含的页<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件来发送到`Page2.aspx`。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.PostBackUrl%2A> property, the page posts back to itself.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.PostBackUrl%2A>属性，在页发回发到自身。

trans-unit.source: When performing a cross-page postback with controls with server-side validation, you should check that the page's <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A> property is `true` before processing the postback.
trans-unit.target: 在执行与服务器端验证的控件与跨页回发时，你应检查页的<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A>属性是`true`之前处理回发。

trans-unit.source: In the case of a cross-page postback, the page to check is the PreviousPage.
trans-unit.target: 对于跨页回发，页面以检查是 PreviousPage。

trans-unit.source: The following Visual Basic code shows how this is done:
trans-unit.target: 下面的 Visual Basic 代码演示如何做到这一点：

trans-unit.source: For more information on cross-page posting techniques, see [Cross-Page Posting in ASP.NET Web Forms](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b).
trans-unit.target: 有关跨页发送技术的详细信息，请参阅[跨页发布 ASP.NET Web 窗体中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b)。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.PostBackUrl%2A> property to perform a cross-page post.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.PostBackUrl%2A>属性来执行跨页 post。

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control, the page posts the value entered in the text box to the target page specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.PostBackUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件，在页发到指定的目标页的文本框中输入的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.PostBackUrl%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To run this sample, you must also create a file for the target page in the same directory as this code example.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，你还必须在此代码示例所在的目录中创建目标页的文件。

trans-unit.source: The code for the target page is provided in the next example.
trans-unit.target: 目标页的代码是下一步的示例中提供的。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreviousPage%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to access a value that was posted from another page using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.PostBackUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreviousPage%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性来访问从另一个页使用的一个值，已发布<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.PostBackUrl%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This page gets the string that was posted from the previous page and displays it to the user.
trans-unit.target: 此页获取已发布从前一页，并将其显示给用户的字符串。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to run this code example directly, you will get an error because the value of the `Text` field will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试直接运行此代码示例，则将会出错，因为值`Text`字段将为`null`。

trans-unit.source: Instead, use this code to create a target page and place the file in the same directory as the code for the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 相反，使用此代码创建一个目标页面并将该文件放在与上一示例的代码相同的目录。

trans-unit.source: The name of the file must correspond to the value specified for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.PostBackUrl%2A> property in the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 文件的名称必须对应于指定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.PostBackUrl%2A>上一示例中的属性。

trans-unit.source: When you run the code for the previous example, this page will execute automatically when the cross-page post occurs.
trans-unit.target: 当你运行上一示例的代码时，此页将在发生跨页发送时自动执行。

trans-unit.source: Raises events for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> control when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> 控件回发到服务器时引发此控件的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> member is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>派生从自定义类时，主要由控件开发人员使用的成员<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件。

trans-unit.source: This method is used internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control, when it is clicked, to raise a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click> event and, if defined, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Command> event.
trans-unit.target: 内部使用此方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件，它被单击时，引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Click>事件并根据定义，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Command>事件。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the ASP.NET application that the state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> control has changed.
trans-unit.target: 通知 ASP.NET 应用程序 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> 控件的状态已更改。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> member is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>派生从自定义类时，主要由控件开发人员使用的成员<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件。

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden in a derived class to raise change events for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 可以引发更改事件派生的类中重写此方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控制当回发到服务器。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the <see langword="disabled" /> attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled" /> property is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示在控件的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled" /> 属性为 <see langword="false" /> 时，控件是否应将呈现的 HTML 元素的 <see langword="disabled" /> 特性设置为 "disabled"。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility" /> property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than <c>4.0</c>; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility" />属性指示 ASP.NET 版本低于<c>4.0</c>; 否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指示 ASP.NET 应的呈现方式 HTML 控件时控件被禁用。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为`true`，ASP.NET 呈现`disabled`属性时控件被禁用。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为`false`，ASP.NET 呈现`class`属性时控件被禁用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control, used to index the <c>postCollection</c>.
trans-unit.target: 控件的键标识符，用于对 <c>postCollection</c> 进行索引。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> collection that contains value information indexed by control identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> 集合，包含由控件标识符索引的值信息。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the server control's state changes as a result of the postback; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果回发导致服务器控件的状态发生更改，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: The text caption that is displayed for the button.
trans-unit.target: 为该按钮显示的文本标题。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Text%2A> member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Text%2A>成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag" /> value that corresponds to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取与 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag" /> 控件相对应的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag" /> 枚举值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.TagKey%2A> property is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.TagKey%2A>派生从自定义类时，使用属性主要由控件开发人员<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.TagKey%2A> property to determine the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag> value associated with an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.TagKey%2A>属性来确定<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag>与关联的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件。

trans-unit.source: This property overrides the base implementation to always return `HtmlTextWriterTag.Input`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性重写基实现来始终返回`HtmlTextWriterTag.Input`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.TagKey%2A> method in a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control so that it always returns an Input tag.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.TagKey%2A>在自定义的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控制，以便它始终返回一个输入标记。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension.
trans-unit.target: 代码示例的第一部分必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。

trans-unit.source: The second part must be in a .cs file (for C#) or a .vb file (for Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 第二个部分必须在.cs 文件 （对于 C# 中) 或 （对于 Visual Basic) 的.vb 文件中。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
trans-unit.target: Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> control's <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> 控件的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText" /> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> control's <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> 控件的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText" /> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Text%2A> property is not intended to be called directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.Text%2A>属性不应在代码中直接调用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> 控件回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

trans-unit.source: The group of controls for which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton" /> 控件回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category.
trans-unit.target: 验证组允许您将在页面上的验证控件分配给特定类别。

trans-unit.source: Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page.
trans-unit.target: 每个验证组都可以独立于其他页上的验证组进行验证。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.ValidationGroup%2A> property to specify the name of the validation group for which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.ValidationGroup%2A>属性来为其指定验证组的名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件回发到服务器时要进行验证。

trans-unit.source: This property has an effect only when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性才起作用时，才的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CausesValidation%2A>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.ValidationGroup%2A> property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 当指定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.ValidationGroup%2A>属性，只会验证控件且是指定组的一部分时验证<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件回发到服务器。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for this property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此属性的值与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.CausesValidation%2A>属性设置为`true`，该控件发回发到服务器时，该页上未分配给验证组的所有验证控件进行都验证。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.ValidationGroup%2A> property to specify the controls to validate when an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton.ValidationGroup%2A>属性来指定要验证时的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件回发到服务器。

trans-unit.source: The page contains three text boxes to capture data from the user and three <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> controls to ensure that the user does not leave a text box blank.
trans-unit.target: 页面包含用于捕获从用户的数据的三个文本框和三个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>控件以确保用户未将一个文本框留空。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> controls for the first two text boxes are in the `PersonalInfoGroup` validation group and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> control for the third text box is in the `LocationInfoGroup` validation group.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>控制中的前两个文本框中为`PersonalInfoGroup`验证组和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>控件中的第三个文本框是`LocationInfoGroup`验证组。

trans-unit.source: When `ImageButton1` is clicked, only the controls in validation group `PersonalInfoGroup` are validated.
trans-unit.target: 当`ImageButton1`单击后，仅验证组中的控件`PersonalInfoGroup`进行验证。

trans-unit.source: When `ImageButton2` is clicked, only the control in validation group `LocationInfoGroup` is validated.
trans-unit.target: 当`ImageButton2`单击后，仅验证分组中的控件`LocationInfoGroup`进行验证。
